name: Videoart | Last Call
description: Last Call – The latest report from the UN Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) has been seen as a kind of “last call” to save Earth from an impending catastrophe. Young activist Greta Thunberg, who gave her speech at the UN Climate Action Summit, makes it clear that the call is urgent. The life of the planet and of our existence is in danger. Sound project presented at the Sound Creation Workshop dictated by the composer Hara Alonso within the framework of the PRISMA Festival.
